bugprone-float-loop-counter.description:
Description

Flags
for
loops where the induction expression has a floating-point type.

References
This check corresponds to the CERT C Coding Standard rule
FLP30-C. Do not use floating-point variables as loop counters
.
bugprone-float-loop-counter.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
